Validate custom baseline expression data

validate_custom_baseline.Rd

This function validates that custom baseline expression data has the required structure and data types for use in power analysis.

Usage

validate_custom_baseline(data, file_path = "uploaded file")

Arguments

data

Data frame containing custom baseline expression data

file_path

Character. Optional file path for error messages (default: "uploaded file")

Value

List with validation results:

valid

Logical. TRUE if data passes all validation checks

data

Data frame. Cleaned and validated data (if valid=TRUE)

errors

Character vector. Error messages (if valid=FALSE)

warnings

Character vector. Warning messages

summary

Character. Summary statistics for display

Details

Required columns:

  • response_id: Character vector of gene IDs (preferably Ensembl IDs)

  • relative_expression: Numeric vector of expression values (TPM/1e6 scale)

  • expression_size: Numeric vector of dispersion parameters (positive values)
